messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2305
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/29/02 7:51:41 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/29/02 7:51:41 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
writes:

<< Sherry
(who believes that censorship of dissenting opinion is a tool of either
insecure or evil people)
>>

Couldn't let this pass.

Ned was not booted for having dissenting opinions. Many people here agree
with the content of his posts. It was his refusal to stop his torrent of
rants, which to me, hardly ever really addressed what others were talking
about. He was politely asked quite a few times. He clearly made a choice to
ignore the intent of this list as explained by the moderators.

That is not censorship.

Paula
